name: aframe-simulation-demo
description: A-Frame VR simulation of separating a chip from a circuit board.

scripts.copy: shx cp -r index.html vendor assets dist step1 step2 step3 site/
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run copy && gh-pages -d site
scripts.predeploy: npm run clean && shx mkdir -p site

author: Salvador de la Puente <salva@unoyunodiez.com>
